title: font used by Paula Scher
content: You could achieve a look quite a bit like this with our own Mark Simonson's ['Mostra'](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125850/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/mostra/). It comes in 5 weights (the heavy is most like this) and many characters have 2 or 3 variations. It is all uppercase, but creating a lower case 'i' and a few smaller-size latters would be easy enough using a heavier weight (Mostra Black) at a smaller size. It is also based on type styles of the 20's and 30's.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: Storm's [Banhof](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518125850/http:/www.stormtype.com/bahn.html) isn't a match, but it has a similar feel.
